DOC.detailed_description: 70 men woman age 18-65 diagnosed migraine medical doctor . Participants must use nonprescription medication treat head pain . Once initial eligibility determine informed consent obtain , Traditional Chinese Medicine ( TCM ) differential diagnosis carry determine underlying cause migraine experience participant . Group 2 continue current nonprescription migraine medication need receive acupuncture . The set predetermine acupuncture point use session . All participant complete daily headache medication use diary four week two separate occasion . In addition participant complete Headache Impact Test ( HIT-6 ) survey three separate occasion .
